mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID userId , MILEAGE_TITLE mileageTitle , MILEAGE_CONTENT mileageContent , MILEAGE_CATEGORY mileageCategory , MILEAGE_IMG mileageImg , MILEAGE_STATUS mileageStatus , CREATE_DATE createDate FROM TB_MILEAGE WHERE MILEAGE_SEQ = #{mileageSeq}
SELECT MILEAGE_SEQ mileageSeq , MILEAGE_CATEGORY mileageCategory , USER_ID userId , CREATE_DATE createDate , MILEAGE_STATUS mileageStatus FROM TB_MILEAGE ORDER BY createDate DESC

SELECT MILEAGE_STORE_SEQ mileageStoreSeq , MILEAGE_STORE_CATEGORY mileageStoreCategory , MILEAGE_STORE_NAME mileageStoreName , MILEAGE_STORE_PRICE mileageStorePrice FROM TB_MILEAGE_STORE ORDER BY mileageStoreSeq ASC
